p: Monthly measures of weather variables were obtained from 2 local meteorological stations: i) Arturo Michelena International Airport (10°08′59′′ N, 67°55′42′′ W) for Carabobo state; and ii) Maracay Base Aérea Sucre (10°15′00′′ N, 67°38′58′′ W) for Aragua state. Local climate data included monthly records of the mean, minimum, and maximum temperature (°C), and the monthly total precipitation (mm).
